USER QUERY: "Please turn off the Address Sign Planter and then quickly turn it back on."

__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "n020_huegrp88",
  "command_id": "DOF",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to turn off the Address Sign Planter, so we use the DOF command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
__BEGIN_NUCORE_COMMAND__
{
  "device_id": "n020_huegrp88",
  "command_id": "DFON",
  "reasoning": "The user wants to quickly turn the Address Sign Planter back on, so we use the Fast On (DFON) command."
}
__END_NUCORE_COMMAND__
